Name: Bjonness406-convert2mkv
Overview:
[b]A docker to convert your videos to mkv or mp4 [/b]

[br][br]When you start the container, it will start the script, and stop when the script is finished. 
[br]So you will need to restart the container when you add a file you want to convert
[br]You will need to place the videos you want to convert, in the appdata folder (/config).

[br][br]Thanks to @ntrevena (at plex forum) for the script!
ModeratorComment: This app appears to have been abandonded, with no updates since 2016.  Advised to utilize instead MakeMKV from DJoss
